div.p: Two kinds of configurations are required to achieve this plugin functionality viz. configuration in solrconfig.xml, and web.xml

blockquote.p: 1. Open the solrconfig.xml file in editing mode and add the following lines at the end of the file to configure XMLWriter and handlers and save the file.
2. Search the declaration like Custom Cache under query tag and add the following line after the end of the Custom Cache comment to configure user defined cache and save the file.
1. Open the web.xml file of the solr.war in editing mode and add the following lines at the end of the file to configure the servlet for request pattern like /cmf/* and save the file.

2. Uncomment the tag name env-entry and type the appropriate value of the '/put/your/solr/home/here' under the sub tag env-entry-value to deploy the solr.war in any web server other than Apache Solr. and save the file.
